attributes.comment:
I have to complain in the strongest possible terms about the proposed increase in
the fees associated with adoption applications. The US CIS is proposing a 66%
increase in fees for I-600 form applications, biometrics, and other paperwork. My
husband and I have been working on adopting a child from China for over a year.
International adoption is already an extraordinarily expensive process. A sixty-six
percent increase in fees from the CIS adds to an already huge burden on people
who are simply trying to become parents in one of the only ways open to them.
Please reconsider this increase.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Christine A. McAllister
